nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in lock exchange test case. Typical value is 20.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean in the lock exchange test case.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_cold_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of water in the cold half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_warm_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of water in the warm half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_direction
nml_option.description: If y, warm/cold changes in the y-direction. If z, warm/cold changes in z-direction.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_lock_exchange_isopycnal_min_thickness
nml_option.description: minimum layer thickness for isopycnal case
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number, typically 0.01 to 1.0
